text: Chunkara (Aymara for "pointed mountain", Hispanicized spelling Chungara) is a mountain in the Sillapaka mountain range in the Andes of Peru, about high . It is located in the Puno Region, Lampa Province, Paratia District, northeast of Sillapaka. ==References== Category:Mountains of Peru Category:Mountains of Puno Region
title: Chunkara (Puno)
